item.title: {quarto-nhs-theme} v0.2.0
item.dc:creator: Craig R Shenton
item.description:
v0.2.0

1. Moved all website files to the `docs/` folder so that the root folder can be used for analytical code. (see [nhspy-plotthedots](https://github.com/nhs-pycom/nhspy-plotthedots) for an example project)
2. Changed the font to `[open-sans](https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Open+Sans)` open font.
3. Added [bootstrap icons](https://icons.getbootstrap.com/).
4. Added blog fuction and [giscus comments](https://github.com/giscus/giscus).
5. Added drop down menues to top bar
6. Added Quarto `.css` for hero banner and buttons
7. Added auto publish all `.qmd` files in `tutorials/` and `documentation/` folders

item.title: Welcome To My Blog
item.dc:creator: Craig R Shenton
item.description:
Welcome to my new blog! I’m excited to share my thoughts, ideas, and experiences with you on this platform. This blog will be a place where I can share my passions and interests, as well as provide helpful information and insights on topics that I’m knowledgeable about.

I’m passionate about many things, but some of the main topics that I’ll be writing about on this blog include technology, data science, and personal development. I’ll be sharing tips and tricks for using new technologies, discussing the latest trends and developments in the field of data science, and offering advice on how to improve your personal and professional skills.

I hope that you’ll find my blog interesting and informative, and that you’ll come back often to read my latest posts. I welcome your feedback and suggestions, and I’m looking forward to connecting with you and engaging in meaningful discussions on this platform.

Thank you for visiting my blog, and I hope that you’ll enjoy what you read here. Happy reading!
